cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 11th Dec 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 11th Dec 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Standard Room with 2 x Single Bed, en-suite with shower, TV, Mini Fridge, Tea/Coffee Station, Aircon/ Heat-pump

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 2 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Self Contained Studio Apartment with, Queen or King bed, kitchenette, utensils, Tea/ Coffee Station, Mini fridge, Aircon/ Heat-pump, TV.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Apartment Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Triple Share room with 1 x Queen and 1 x Single bed. Additional bed available at extra cost. Room has kitchenette, utensils, mini fridge, aircon/ heat-pump, TV

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 4 Bed Family Room Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Furnished room With 1 x King Bed and 2 x Single beds. Extra single can be added at extra cost. Room comes with en-suite shower, TV, Air-con/ Heat-pump

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
